text:
Hi Guian. How are you? Are you back at college after holidays?  Please let me know how I can be more helpful to you. We have received general feedback that the mentees would like 1) A better understanding of what skills are required in their desired careers and how to get them
and 2.) Examples/pictures of the workplace and pieces of work you are up to.  Would this be helpful to you?  If so I can definitely help with 2) and with 1) if you let me know a wee bit more about what you'd like to know.  :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello Lucy I am back at college and the info from the feedback would be extremely helpful as it can be quite daunting to understand how exactly to specialise in such a diverse space. I would like to know more about portfolios especially on how to build a  unique and well developed one that would stand out to employers and universities.
